original_text:
Three things are stately in their tread;
    four are stately in their stride:
korean_text: 잘 걸으며 위풍 있게 다니는 것 서넛이 있나니

sentences.original_text: Three things are stately in their tread
sentences.korean_translation: 세 가지는 그 걸음에 품위가 있고

sentences.original_text: four are stately in their stride:
sentences.korean_translation: 네 가지는 그 걸음에 품위가 있습니다
